Header: Another circular to ensure security of schools
Content: A special circular on the instructions of Education Minister Akila Viraj Kaariyawasam has been issued for further ensuring the security of schoolchildren and teachers. Accordingly setting up of security committees and security have been addressed to the islandâ€™s education authorities and school heads by circular number 25/2019. The circular further states that schoolchildren, parents and alumni should be made aware about identification and prevention of the danger. The circular has been released focusing attention on 18 points including strengthening of security in the vicinity of school gates, inspection of student bags, ensuring the identity of students, ensuring the security of hostels, and the adoption of appropriate communication methods at emergency situations.
